segments.text: I'd like to rent a car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your driver's license , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is my international driver's license . What kinds of cars do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have Honda , Citroen and Toyota . Which make and model do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll take the Citroen C2 . What is the rate for the car per day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The price is 60 euro per day . Do you want insurance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's an extra 10 euro a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to fill up when I check in ?
segments.speaker: S1
